I've found the problem: If you include a JSP like so:

<%@ include file="/common.jsp" %>

then the editor will try to load "/common.jsp". It should prefix such an absolute path with the webapp directory.

traces.message: Path must include project and resource name: /version.html
Path must include project and resource name: /Dummy.jsp
